title: The Deep Soul 25 (Dancing Man's Guide to Music)
description:
Once every decade a child is born who'll grow up to love depressive soul you can't dance to, and if you are one of those miserable few, this is for you! To avoid the without exception naff definitions of "deep soul" bandied about shamelessly in liner notes and on the web, just play the first track here, lean back and listen: THAT is "deep soul".


01 - Barbara & The Browns - To Know I Can't Touch.mp3
02 - Toussaint McCall - I'll Do It for You.mp3
03 - Soul Brothers Six - What Can You Do When You Ain't Got Nobody.mp3
04 - O.V. Wright - Let's Straighten It Out.mp3
05 - Ruben Wright - I'll Be There.mp3
06 - Joe Tex - The Love You Save (May Be Your Own).mp3
07 - Janet & The Jays - Without a Reason.mp3
08 - The Soul Clan - That's How It Feels.mp3
09 - Howard Tate - Get It While You Can.mp3
10 - Wendy Rene - After Laughter (Comes Tears).mp3
11 - Otis Redding - A Change Is Gonna Come.mp3
12 - Percy Sledge - It Tears Me Up.mp3
13 - Little Richard - I Don't Know What You Got But It's Got Me.mp3
14 - Al Green - Simply Beautiful.mp3
15 - Aaron Neville - Tell It Like It Is.mp3
16 - Eldridge Holmes - Love Problem.mp3
17 - Clarence Carter - I Can't See Myself.mp3
18 - Lorraine Ellison - Stay With Me.mp3
19 - Wallace Brothers - Lover's Prayer.mp3
20 - Ann Peebles - I've Been There Before.mp3
21 - James Carr - Love Attack.mp3
22 - George Jackson - I Don't Need You No More.mp3
23 - Arthur Conley - In the Same Old Way.mp3
24 - Aretha Franklin - One Step Ahead.mp3
25 - Diamond Joe - Moanin' and Screamin' Pts. 1 & 2.mp3

Doris Duke - I'm a Loser: the Swamp Dogg Sessions and More
James Carr - The Complete Goldwax Singles

Otis Redding - Pain in My Heart

Ruby Johnson - I'll Run Your Hurt Away

Various - Dave Godin's Deep Soul Treasures Vol. 1-4
Various - Deep Soul Inferno
Various - Down & Out: The Sad Soul of the Black South
Various - Heavy Soul: Old Town & Barry's Deep Down & Dirty Sides
Various - King's Serious Soul: Too Much Pain
Various - Lost Deep Soul Treasures, Vol. 1-6
Various - Our Turn to Cry: 25 Breathtaking Atlantic Ballads
Various - Sanctified Soul
Various - Solid Gold Soul: Deep Soul
Various - Soul Jewels Volume 1: Losers Win Sometime
Various - Southern Soul Showcase

Various - The Goldwax Story Vol. 1
Various - Troubles, Heartaches & Sadness: Hi Deep Soul Sisters
Various - When a Man Cries: The Deep Soul of Sceptor/Wand & Musicor/Dynamo

Check http://www.melingo.com/thesoulnet/index.htm and http://www.sirshambling.com/general/welcome.htm for further inspiration.
